description: ***UPDATE: Added support for Exhibition Mode (FOR 2.0+ DEVICES ONLY)*** WebUI for WebOS PRO allows you to connect to your uTorrent WebUI and view and control your torrents. Torrents can be stopped, resumed, and removed (torrent only or torrent & data), and you can add new torrents (by RSS, by url and by in-app search). PRO version adds support for RSS feeds and multiple servers! More RSS features, and other features coming soon!! Please Note: This application does not actually handle downloading the torrents...you must have a uTorrent installation on a computer with access to the WebUI interface already set up (see http://rjamdev.info/?page_id=207 for help setting this up).
